DOC.brief_title: Two-stent vs Provisional Stenting Techniques Patients With Complex Coronary Bifurcation Lesions

Based previous study , rate 1-year target lesion failure event around 25 % PCI provisional stenting . And previous data show event 12-month DK crush procedure 15 % . Considering lose follow-up , anticipated 660 patient enrolled trial . All patient repeat angiography 13 month , clinical follow-up 5 year .
